AlarmDescriptions: MISTRAL_PRESSURE_M1:Chamber pressure exceeds limit in M1
MISTRAL_PRESSURE_M2:Chamber pressure exceeds limit in M2
MISTRAL_PRESSURE_M4:Chamber pressure exceeds limit in M4
MISTRAL_PRESSURE_MONO:Chamber pressure exceeds limit in MONO
MISTRAL_PRESSURE_TXM:Chamber pressure exceeds limit in TXM
BL09_EPS_WARNING:BL09 PLC is in WARNING state
BL09_EPS_INTERLOCK:BL09 PLC is in INTERLOCK state
NO_BEAM:MAchine Beam lost or FE closed
AlarmList: BL09_STATES:any([s<0 or str(s) in ('UNKNOWN','FAULT') for s in FIND(BL00/VC/ALL/State)+FIND(BL00/VC/VGCT-0*/State)+FIND(BL00/VC/IPCT-0*/State)])
BL09_EPS_WARNING:[p for p in FIND(BL00/*/EPS-PLC-01/PLC_Config_Status) if p[-5] in str(1)]
BL09_EPS_INTERLOCK:[p for p in FIND(BL00/*/EPS-PLC-01/PLC_Config_Status) if p[-3] in str(1)]
BL09_IPCT_OFF:any([s in (OFF,UNKNOWN,FAULT) for s in FIND(*/vc/ipct*/state)])
MISTRAL_WATER:not all(( BL00/CT/EPS-PLC-01/WAS_X01_01 , BL00/CT/EPS-PLC-01/WAS_X01_02 )) or BL00/CT/EPS-PLC-01/FM_EH01_01 < 15.0

controller offers as many channels as the user wants.\
    Each channel has two _MUST_HAVE_ extra attributes:\
    +) TangoAttribute - Tango attribute to retrieve the value of the counter\
    +) Formula - Formula to evaluate using 'VALUE' as the tango attribute value\
    As examples you could have:\
    ch1.TangoExtraAttribute = 'my/tango/device/attribute1'\
    ch1.Formula = '-1 * VALUE'\
    ch2.TangoExtraAttribute = 'my/tango/device/attribute2'\
    ch2.Formula = 'math.sqrt(VALUE)'\
